name: Auto Cruise - Idle Car Merger
description:
Merge, Build, and Become the Catalyst for the Car Evolution!

Ever dreamed of traveling the world in your own hi-tech ride? Build your parking yard and grow your OWN transport tycoon now.

Buy, merge and manage your transports so they can generate more capital for you. And maybe one day, your cars will all take off from the ground and soar forward!

Step on it today!
